text: @OregonGovBrown Kate---it's easy for all to see that you set this up so that no county--no matter how successful in thwarting the coronavirus---won't be opening this fall.  This appears to be another in your efforts to do the opposite of what Trump wants---simply because he is Trump.  Pathetic.
